    • isRateLimited

      protected abstract boolean isRateLimited(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender player, Channel channel)
      Check if a player is rate-limited in a channel If the data medium is not REDIS, the rate-limit register will be local
      Parameters:
      player - The player
      channel - The channel
      Returns:
      true if the player is rate-limited, false otherwise

    • sendGenericChat

      public abstract void sendGenericChat(@NotNull @NotNull ChatMessageInfo chatMessageInfo, @Nullable @Nullable org.bukkit.entity.Player recipient)
      Send a generic (non-private) ChatMessageInfo to all local players Checks multicast permissions and mentions (It calls sendComponentOrCache at the end)
      Parameters:
      chatMessageInfo - The chat message to send
      recipient - The receiver of the message, null if it's a global/broadcasted message

    • sendPrivateChat

      Sends a private message to the receiver inside the chatMessageInfo It is the final step of the private message process
      Parameters:
      chatMessageInfo - The chat packet to send
